title: 今日AI新增信息分析：技术、基础设施、应用、资本和风险信号
core_insight: 今日新增的AI信息主要集中在技术层面，包括新型模型、算法和应用场景的提出和探索，基础设施、应用层、资本和风险信号方面变化相对较小。

dimension_texts.technology: 新型模型和算法的提出，如Graph Your Way to Inspiration和Causal Direction from Convergence Time，推进了LLM的能力边界 新范式的提出，如ArchAgent和Zatom-1，开创了新的研究方向 Graph Your Way to Inspiration: Integrating Co-Author Graphs with Retrieval-Augmented Generation for Large Language Model Based Scientific Idea Generation Causal Direction from Convergence Time: Faster Training in the True Causal Direction
dimension_texts.infrastructure: 今日无显著变化 今日无显著变化
dimension_texts.application: 新应用场景的探索，如Patient-Centered, Graph-Augmented Artificial Intelligence-Enabled Passive Surveillance for Early Stroke Risk Detection 传统解决方案的替代，如使用LLM进行错误检测 Patient-Centered, Graph-Augmented Artificial Intelligence-Enabled Passive Surveillance for Early Stroke Risk Detection in High-Risk Individuals Importance of Prompt Optimisation for Error Detection in Medical Notes Using Language Models

dimension_texts.risk: 今日无显著变化 今日无显著变化 今日无显著变化
